import React, { useState } from "react" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import NavbarItems from '../data/Links.json' import Modal from "../Modal/Modal" import logo from '../images/logo3.png' import { Route, Routes, useLocation } from "react-router-dom" import "../style.css" import "./Navbar.css" import Cart from "../" export default function Navbar({ size, toggleCart }) { const location = useLocation(); const { pathname } = useLocation(); const [openModal, setModal] = useState(false) const [navbarIcon, setNavbarIcon] = React.useState("fas fa-bars") //Initialize menu icon const [menuOpen, setMenuOpen] = React.useState(false) //Init state -> closed function handleNavbar() { setNavbarIcon(prevIcon => prevIcon === "fas fa-bars" ? "fas fa-times" : "fas fa-bars"); setMenuOpen(prevOpen => !prevOpen) // toggle the menu open/closed } return (
    {NavbarItems.map((item, index) => { return ( <>
  • { handleNavbar(); }} >{item.title}
    • ) })}
  • setModal(false)} />
setModal(false)} />
) }
